text:
At Presence, we are on a mission to provide exceptional and innovative teletherapy tools and services for preK-12 students with special needs to help them grow and thrive. With 12 years of experience delivering more than 3 million teletherapy sessions, we are a leading provider of live online special education-related services, including speech-language therapy, behavioral and mental health services, occupational therapy, and assessment. When you join the Presence Care Network of 1,500+ clinicians, you become part of an engaged community of clinicians who are dedicated to serving students no matter where they are. And, you’ll do it on our state-of-the-art proprietary platform, built by clinicians for clinicians. Telepractice with Presence helps clinicians like you broaden access to much-needed therapy services across the country. With cross-licensing support as needed, and the flexibility to work from home and design your own schedule, you’ll take control of your caseload to work smarter. As a Presenceclinician, you’ll join a network of industry-leading changemakers available for professional input and community. We’re always looking for dedicated providers like you to join our mission. Learn more and begin the application process here. Here’s why more SLPs choose teletherapy with Presence: What we are looking for: What experience helps? Do you have questions before you apply? Please email askrecruiting@presencelearning.com to connect with our clinical recruiting team. Apply Now Apply Now ASHA thanks our Corporate Partners. ASHA does not endorse outside products or services. The American Speech-Language-Hearing Association (ASHA) is the national professional, scientific, and credentialing association for 228,000 members and affiliates who are audiologists; speech-language pathologists; speech, language, and hearing scientists; audiology and speech-language pathology support personnel; and students.
